means: 在那边的，对岸的，那边的

sentence.Network_en: Refugees run hither and thither in search of safety.
sentence.Network_cn: 难民们四处逃奔，寻求安全之所。

sentence.Network_en: They have dragged themselves thither for shelter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们费力地挪动到那边躲避。

sentence.Network_en: He wandered hither and thither looking for a playmate.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... hither 向这里 thither 向那里 ex-soldier 退伍军人.
新概念英语单词表  第四册   （1） - 豆丁网 ... conjuring n. 魔术 99 thither a. 对岸的, 那边的; Dane n. 丹麦人 103.
常用生活英语词汇_中国梦想家 ... thistle 蓟 thither 到那里 thorn 刺.

list.abs: and their way thither lay over the bright Asa-bridge , or Bifraust , or Rainbow , which was said to afire , so as to keep away the Frost giants of Utunheim .他们来去的路横在明亮的亚撒大桥，或比夫罗斯特天桥，或者说是一道彩虹上。据说，为了抵挡来自尤通汉姆的霜雪巨人，这座桥一直烈焰熊熊，终年不灭。
or , without buying his freedom , to abscond thither ., 或者不赎回自由 , 而潜逃到那里.
for if there were several ways that led thither , there would not be so much as a pretence left for compulsion .因为如果有好几条路通往天国，那么就不会留下那么多的强迫借口了。
the thither side of the pond ., 水池的远侧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thider, alteration (by association with hither) of thæder, of Germanic origin; related to that and the

entry.def: Thither means to the place that has already been mentioned.

example.ex: They have dragged themselves thither for shelter.
example.tran: 他们费力地挪动到那边躲避。

means.word_mean: 1. to or toward that place; away from the speaker;

auth_sentence.content: Look at the waves oscillating hither, thither on the beach.
